author: llunerti
body: I've added the decay file for the central production of a B(s,d)->hh->MuMu sample, where h is a pi or a K, needed for the B->MuMu analysis. Moreover, a reduced pi and k lifetime is needed for this sample, this is the reason why a new pdl file has been added.
title: Adding dec and pdl file for B(s,d)->hh->MuMu production
